headline: Charter Communications (CHTR) Valuation Check After Prolonged Share Price Weakness
summary: Recent performance snapshot Charter Communications (CHTR) has been on many investors’ watchlists after a tough stretch, with the stock showing negative returns over the past month, past 3 months, year to date, and over the past year. Against that share price backdrop, the company reports annual revenue of US$55.1b and net income of US$5.1b. The company has reported modest annual growth in both revenue and net income, which helps frame how the current valuation compares with its recent...
